title: Amazon BSR Explained: What Your Book Rank REALLY Means for Sales
description:
Grab My Self Publishing Roadmap - https://kristabrea.com/roadmap

If you’re self-publishing on Amazon and confused by your book’s BSR (Best Seller Rank), this video breaks it all down in a simple, practical way. Amazon BSR is one of the most misunderstood metrics in self-publishing, and not understanding it can lead authors to make wrong decisions about pricing, ads, and whether their book is actually performing.

In this video, I explain what Amazon BSR is, how it works, and why it’s so important for evaluating your book’s sales performance. You’ll learn how BSR updates, why lower numbers mean higher sales, and how BSR differs across formats like ebook, paperback, and hardcover. I also show how to use a BSR calculator to estimate how many copies your book may be selling per day based on its rank.
